projectOverview.projectName: Trades Migration – Legacy System to Target Platform

overallStatus.summary: Project status is RED due to a 7-day delay in reconciliation sign-off. Migration activities are progressing well, and mitigation plans are in place to maintain the go-live schedule.

keyAchievements: Completed data extraction for 2.3 million trades
Validated field-level mapping for OTC derivatives
Refreshed UAT environment with latest migration scripts
Conducted business walkthrough with Operations and Risk teams

scheduleAndCostStatus.schedule: Delayed by 2 days due to reconciliation cycle extension

risks.description: Delay in reconciliation sign-off impacting final migration schedule
Limited availability of UAT environment during dry run

nextSteps: Accelerate reconciliation activities with daily status reviews
Coordinate with Operations team to finalize migration schedule
Prepare rollback plan in case of unexpected issues during final migration
